description:
A full-size airbag pack for avalanche pros, guides and other folks who want an airbag rig with enough carrying capacity for a full day in the backcountry. The Float 32's airbag is designed to reduce or eliminate burial depth and protect your head, neck and upper body from trauma should you be caught in an avalanche.

  • Trigger can be run to either shoulder and stores under a zipper
  • Single-chamber 150L airbag has a super-efficient Venturi system
  • Refillable Float 2.0 air cartridge sold separately
  • Empty cartridges can be filled at BCA-authorized depots
  • Internal frame and load lifter straps comfortably distribute heavy loads
  • External shovel and probe pockets, hipbelt pockets, and lined goggle pocket keeps your gear organized
  • Stowable diagonal ski carry (snowboard carry system sold separately)
name: Backcountry Access Float 32 Avalanche Bag - Unisex
